abstract: After 52 years, countless oven-hot pies and numerous copycats, Ray's Pizza will soon serve its last slice on Prince Street.
snippet: After 52 years, countless oven-hot pies and numerous copycats, Ray's Pizza will soon serve its last slice on Prince Street.
lead_paragraph: Fifty-two years and countless oven-hot pies later, Ray's Pizza - the Ray's Pizza - will serve its last slice on Prince Street on Sunday.

headline.main: Ray's Pizza, 'the' Ray's Pizza, Will Close on Sunday
